atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the `@tailwind` directive to insert Tailwind's `base`, `components`, `utilities` and `screens` styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the `@layer` directive to tell Tailwind which layer a custom utility belongs to.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use the `@apply` directive to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Use the `@responsive` directive to create responsive variants of custom utilities.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: Use the `@screen` directive to create media queries that reference your breakpoints by name.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Use the `@variants` directive to generate utilities with variants like hover, focus, etc.
